dt: {bc}a garden plant ({it}Brassica oleracea botrytis{/it}) related to the cabbage and grown for its compact edible head of usually white undeveloped flowers
{bc}its flower cluster used as a vegetable

et: Italian {it}cavolfiore{/it}, from {it}cavolo{/it} cabbage (from Late Latin {it}caulus{/it}, from Latin {it}caulis{/it} stem, cabbage) + {it}fiore{/it} flower, from Latin {it}flor-, flos{/it} {ma}{mat|cole|}, {mat|blow|}{/ma}
shortdef: a garden plant (Brassica oleracea botrytis) related to the cabbage and grown for its compact edible head of usually white undeveloped flowers; also : its flower cluster used as a vegetable

dt: {bc}an ear deformed from injury and excessive growth of reparative tissue

shortdef: an ear deformed from injury and excessive growth of reparative tissue
